Show links to curation spreadsheets

curationLinks.Rd

Show links to curation spreadsheets

curationLinks(keyword = "all")

Arguments

keyword

a character vector of physiologies desired. For the available physiologies, run bugphyzz::physiologiesList(). Use "all" for all available physiologies.

Value

a data.frame with physiology names and URLs

Examples

curationLinks()

#>                               physiology      ontology
#> 1                        animal pathogen          <NA>
#> 2               antimicrobial resistance          <NA>
#> 3              antimicrobial sensitivity          <NA>

curationLinks(keyword = "aerophilicity")

#>       physiology      ontology
#> 19 aerophilicity MICRO_0000491
#>                                                                                                                                              link
#> 19 https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQDC8VfkkOfN6MKGxrzMEoJjfgYIfpsJO-SxVr3pkUUChBNkMQ3YKaxSvDSSjjrPRf51nU3wbk-WWJp/pub?output=csv
curationLinks(keyword = c("aerophilicity", "gram stain"))

#>       physiology      ontology
#> 14    gram stain          <NA>
#> 19 aerophilicity MICRO_0000491
